d know that is

tes that since it generates a testng-failed.xml which

 TestNG to rerun only those tests that failed.
>

  I know, I know, but =
it is possible that file already overwritten or 
can't be accessed. :-)

>O=
kay. I'm not ruling data provider names out, I just decided to start simple=

e a point that common interface like Iterator 
does not really fit in here =
because it can't be used to encapsulate

t in the future.
